channel.title: Sleep Psalms with Bishop T.D. Jakes on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics
channel.description: Recent content in Sleep Psalms with Bishop T.D. Jakes on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics

item.title: Psalm 45 | Sleep Psalms with Bishop T.D. Jakes
item.description: Podcast Description Fall asleep to special Psalm devotionals at https://www.sleeppsalms.com Tonight's prayer is from Psalm 45:6. Welcome to "Sleep Psalms with Bishop T.D. Jakes," a tranquil oasis of serenity for your weary soul. In each episode, you'll embark on a soothing journey guided by the wisdom of the most popular book of the Bible, the book of Psalms. Bishop T.D. Jakes' calming voice and gentle prayers will lull you into a peaceful state of mind, perfect for restful sleep or deep meditation.

item.title: Introducing: Sleep Psalms with Bishop T.D. Jakes | Sleep Psalms with Bishop T.D. Jakes
item.description: Podcast Description Fall asleep to the book of Psalms with Bishop T.D. Jakes. Sign up for the Sleep Psalm devotionals at SleepPsalms.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript
